meaningMnemonic: This is a な adjective version of the kanji which means <kanji>calm</kanji>. The vocab version here is <vocabulary>calm</vocabulary> as well, though you can use it to mean <vocabulary>mild</vocabulary> as well.
readingMnemonic: What is <vocabulary>calm</vocabulary>? "<reading>Ode</reading> (おだ) to Joy" is nice and calm and mild, as far as music goes.
